content.query:
COPY INTO dwh.trip_data_green_copy
FROM 'https://synapsecoursedl1968.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/gold/trip_data_green'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,COMPRESSION = 'snappy'
    ,AUTO_CREATE_TABLE = 'ON'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dwh.trip_data_green_copy
GO
